PrecisRe-appointment of PHILIP CHODOS, of Nepean, Ontario, as Vice-Chairperson of the Public Service Staff Relations Board, to hold office during good behaviour for a period ending June 30, 2000, effective April 1, 2000.
Attachments
precis:
Re-appointment of PHILIP CHODOS, of Nepean, Ontario, as Vice-Chairperson
of the Public Service Staff Relations Board, to hold office during good
behaviour for a period ending June 30, 2000, effective April 1, 2000.
